name: Marine Science
description: Explore the oceans, marine ecosystems, and the science of underwater life.

concepts.title: Ocean Currents
concepts.content: Learn how ocean water moves and its effects on climate.

concepts.title: Marine Food Webs
concepts.content: Understand the feeding relationships in marine ecosystems.

concepts.title: Coral Reefs
concepts.content: Study the biodiversity and importance of reef systems.

concepts.title: Deep Sea Exploration
concepts.content: Discover technologies and methods used to study the deep ocean.
